title: in the morning
lyrics:
That you don't
Crush me, soft pack, peeled off, soft top
Need that constant contact, and I hope it don't stop
I swear to God, I pray so hard
Down on the floor, ripped up jeans and my knees pop

Crush me, soft pack, peeled off, soft top

Need that constant contact, and I hope it don't stop

I swear to God, I pray so hard

Down on the floor, ripped up jeans and my knees pop



Run around the function 'til I cannot function

Even with my mind numb, still wonder if you gon' come

Fuck all of that fashion, I'm about that action

Crowded in the bathroom, cut it like a fraction



Summertime, wintertime, it don't matter

All the time, you're on my mind

In the summertime, wintertime, that's all day

That's all the time, you're on my mind

That you don't



Crush me, soft pack, peeled off, soft top

Need that constant contact, and I hope it don't stop

I swear to God, I pray so hard

Down on the floor, ripped up jeans and my knees pop

Crush me, soft pack, peeled off, soft top

Need that constant contact, and I hope it don't stop

I swear to God, I pray so hard

Down on the floor, ripped up jeans and my knees pop



Run around the function 'til I cannot function

Fuck you if you let me, I wipe down all this money, yeah

Everybody else knows I'm about that action

Crowded in the bathroom, cut it like a fraction



Summertime, wintertime, it don't matter

All the time, you're on my mind

In the summertime, wintertime, that's all day

That's all the time, you're on my mind

That you don't



Crush me, soft pack, peeled off, soft top

Need that constant contact, and I hope it don't stop

I swear to God, I pray so hard

Down on the floor, ripped up jeans and my knees pop

Crush me, soft pack, peeled off, soft top

Need that constant contact, and I hope it don't stop

I swear to God, I pray so hard

Down on the floor, ripped up jeans and my knees pop



Baby, don't forget what we did

In the morning, in the morning

Lately, losing grip, not equipped to be broken

And I'm hoping that you don't
